ygData.subject: Re: Re: Subject: RE: Re: RE: Sol Ro Temple Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you want to try to get faction back with the corrupt guards you can hand in goblin ears from HH basement. I think the faction is great. I m up to kindly
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Dec 21/99, kim@... wrote:
>
> I don't know why you'd want to kill him. The weapon you get
> is not really that good, and the faction hit is substantial.
> Repairing your faction with the merchants of Qeynos is easy
> enough (visit Blackburrow). But everything I've found that
> raises your faction with the Corrupt Guards of Qeynos also
> lowers it with the non-corrupt guards.

If you want to try to get faction back with the corrupt guards you can
hand in goblin ears from HH basement.

I think the faction is great. I'm up to kindly with the dwarf guards now
and the merchants in Quenos love me too. The corrupt guards are all
pretty low level (I've heard Kane Bayle, leader of the guards, is a lot
nastier but I've never actually seen him) so they aren't really that
much of a concern after L15 or so.

Besides, after L20 or so, how often do you go to Quenos?

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
